Info: Test the battery on your 8BitCadeXL
Test the buttons on your 8BitCadeXL
Inspired by Crait’s Arduboy Assistant, this version has been expanded to show 25 bytes at a time (to give context) with the current cell highlighted in the middle.
The corrupted Corpo has to be stopped and your hacking skills will be invaluable. Inspired by the game CyberPunk.
A fast paced racing sim.
Pong. What more do you need to say?
An Arduboy version of the classic game Breakout!
A moon patrol remake.
ArduIndy - Inspired by ZX Spectrum game “Sabre Wulf”.
Boris Goes Skiing is a clone of the ZX Spectrum game Horace goes skiing.
Air hockey for the Arduboy! Two players pick their dogsand battle to the end.
An Arduboy version of the classic game Breakout! This one is orientated verically, hence the V.
A dungeon crawling game - avoid the rats and other killers and find the treasure.
Goal is to collect as many diamonds as needed to unlock the exit. You can move rocks, if there is nothing behind it. If a rock falls through a changer, then its converted to a diamond.
Vegas-style slots on the Arduboy!
Inspired by yet another Game and Watch - PPOT presents Oil Panic. Catch all the oil before it sets the shop on fire!

Incher is a worm-guiding simulator. Through some unknown mishap, a handful of good worms are trapped deep behind enemy lines. It is your duty to guide them home, one inch at a time. The path is laden with traps set by the maniacal faces. Avoid these hazards, reach the portals, and prevent your worms' untimely demise.
You are an astronaut on an alien planet with a Jet Pac. Assemble you rocket and gather fuel before taking off.
Collect the coins but be carefull as the floorboards will decrease one by one each time you land on them.
A small Centipede clone.
A remake of the classic Game & Watch game, Octopus!
Inspired by yet another Game and Watch - PPOT presents Oil Panic. Catch all the oil before it sets the shop on fire!
A cross between two classic games - PacMan and Snake.
Re-live the nostalgic glory of games like Pac-Man and Lock ‘n’ Chase (with a few less pixels…) right on your Arduboy!
Another Pacman clone.
Two player pong.
Control your very own small robot as you dodge the barrage of incoming rockets!
Rescue the trapped people as fire consumes the city.
Based on the game BattleShips. This game has a simple AI and music, but is smart enough to be challenging.
A shadow lost his kid by wandering too far away from the light. Now it must find its coloured equal to become one again.

A tribute to the classic Commodore 64 game Space Taxi! Collect and deliver customers to their destination as quickly as possible to make the most money! But be careful and make sure you do not run out of fuel land without deploying your landing gear or squash a customer.
Simulator based on the Star Trek game.
A space shoot 'em up with procedurally generated starfields. Watch for the bomb that freezes time!
Inspired by Tempest, this is a straightforward shooter, except you rotate around the center and shoot towards the middle. Enemies emerge from the “portal” in the middle.
A remake of the 80s classic, QBert.
Classic Atari game Dig Dug on the small screen.

You are the developer of the door with the teleport function. But just before completion, someone is trying to destroy the door. There seems to be no choice but to distort the space with the power of the door and to prevent destruction.
The animals have escaped! Avoid the animals by jumping over them and landing on the crocodiles mouth to snap it shut.
As its name suggests, you must crush the ants underfoot!

A “Pong” demake named “Bip Bipbip” for two players. How to win? It is simple. If the ball touchs your opponent when he doesn’t press his button or if his rectangle reaches the middle of the screen before yours then he loses.
One and two player versin of pong.
Two player tetris.

Collect all of the gold pieces without being touched by a guard then make your way to the top of the screen and to the next level. Stop guards by burning a hole in normal bricks so that they will fall in - revealing any gold they might be carrying.
Collect pollen from nearby flowers and return it to the hive without being hit by other bees.
Catch the paratroopers jumping out of a helicopter before they fall in the water.
A shoot 'em up in space.
A simple button-mashing/beat-the-clock game where the player must avoid the mines and survive for as long as possible.
The Zoo had to close, what can the animals do? A small arcade game, inspired slighty on frogger (but sideways).
Bangi is a classic arcade game where you must shoot and destroy each of the balloons that appear in each level.
Stacker clone like the game at the arcade that gives you a chance to win a prize, however in this one the only thing you win is satisfaction!.
Shoot a chicken as far as you can. Try to hit springboards to give you a boost but watch out for spikes!
This game started out its life as a Frogger clone, ended up being a Freeway clone.
A version of Chrome’s (in?)famous dino side-scroller running-man-style dino jumper.
Manoeuvre the space ship to collect the crates.
An alternative version of 'Flappy Ball' on Arduboy that provides more challenge.
An Audition Dance Game clone for Arduboy
Test your reflexes and your ability to keep up with the buttons. It is super intense and never gets boring because its so addictive!
Control the runing guy and evade pillars.

Dodge gators on your propeller-powered pontoon as it rages faster and faster across the big black bayou. If you can pick up juice for your grandfather’s old shield generator, you can pass right through the congregation as long as it’s powered up
Little fish. Big fish, swimming in the water. Come back here, man. Give me back my star!
A flappy bird clone.
Collect all the eggs in this Mario like game.
Recreation of the classic game Frogger.
Another frogger clone.
In Astroship Gravitron you are a controlling a space ship trying to pass the infamous 5 doge it challenges. In order to pass each level you must not let a single asteroid touch your ship.
A halloween inspired version of Chrome's Dino game.

Helii is a port of my homebrew clone of the old Flash “Helicopter Game” and its ilk (i.e. game type that Flappy Bird is a variation of). As you fly through the tunnel the gap becomes more narrow and more challenging - How far can you go?
Space shoot 'em up.
A moon buggy-style game.
You are an I.T. worker named KeyKat. You must run around and turn computers off and back on again when they fail.
A lunar lander clone.
Lasers - A simple Ikaruga-like game.
Leanna may be a lion, but she knows what she likes: She wants fresh meat from her favorite restaurant.
A lunar lander clone.
Avoid the obstacles as you fly along the trench.
Ozzy the Cat, the official unofficial mascot of #OAuth, is making his debut on the Arduboy!
Quick Block is simple game, tag all blocks in the chosen time limit. Challenge your friends to the fastest time with 100th of milliseconds accuracy.
Catch as many balls as you can in the allotted time.
The classic Nokia snake game.
The classic Nokia snake game.
A remake of the classic Game and Watch game Turtle Bridge. Carry the package to the awaiting truck by jumping across the turtle’s backs. Watch out as they may dive for a snack!
A space shoot 'em up!

Who’s brave enough to play chicken with a train? Stand on the track as multiple trains come at you full-speed… The closer they get to you before jumping off the tracks, the more points you’ll rack up.
Collect all the coins as you swim around.
A simple unicorn themed endless runner.

Avoid incoming enemies on two different modes and test your reflexes. Move your character by pressing UP and DOWN. Sounds easy right? But remember … surviving is hard in this one. Get at least 30 points!

Use it when practicing a musical instrument (except for maybe a drum set, it probably isn’t loud enough for that), or turn it on and hide it somewhere to annoy your family, friends and loved ones with incessant beeps.

Ardutosh is an OS / desktop environment for the Arduboy. The style is inspired by the classic Macintosh interface. It has the following features: Serial terminal, Remote app, Notes text editor, EEPROM hex editor, Battery voltage monitor, Internal temperature monitor, LED tester
I’m not sure if this falls under useful or useless. I’ll let others be the judge. It’s definitely useless in the emulator. You’ll have to load it into a real Arduboy.
Calculates Pi to 24 thousand places.
Play chess on the Arduboy!
A tile slider game.
The classic battleships board game on the Arduboy!

The classic casino game. This implementation plays a ‘unified’ version of the various BlackJack games from different casinos around the world. It allows splits, double up and insurance on a dealer blackjack and so forth.
Classic English game of Cribbage - a luck and tactics card game.
A little puzzle game based on the HP48 / TI83 calculator game Dstar.

You have to pilot a spacecraft around the TRAPPIST-1 system (a recently discovered star with 7 earth-sized planets orbiting it) while delivering pizzas. The goal is to try to make it onto the high-score board by minimizing delivery time and fuel usage.
All Fives is a popular variant of Dominoes where players the goal of the game is not just to go out, but to make the open ends of the layout add up to 5 (or a multiple of five). One or two players.
German Whist is an adaptation of classic Whist for two players. There is nothing German about it - as far as anyone can tell it is of British origin.
Classic hangman with approximately 800 words in its vocabularly.

Hippodrome is a variant of single-player chess where the knights start in the first row and the rest of the pieces, except one, is randomly distributed in the remaining squares. The game consists in taking the knights to the last row, the capture of pieces is not allowed.
An action-puzzle game where you control a knight piece of the chess which can move in an L shape on the 8×4 board.

Santa has delivered the presents and filled the stockings. Help Santa eat the cookies before the kids wake up and discover him in this match 2 puzzle game. Build bigger sets to get extra time and lots of points.
The classic Chinese game of checkers.
A puzzle game with dice.
An abstract strategy board game played on a 4x4 board with 16 unique pieces.
Reversi is a strategy board game for two players, played on an 8×8 uncheckered board.
A famous tile-matching puzzle.
Play Sudoku on your Arduboy. Includes 45 puzzles (easy, medium, hard) and allows custom puzzles to be entered manually or via serial input.
Yes, its tic tac toe (noughts and crosses).
Curly
Build towers in order to keep creeps that spawn at start location(s) and run to the finish location(s). By killing creeps and finishing rounds you earn dollars to buy more towers and upgrades.
Santa needs help, he has a lot of gifts in weird layout and you need to fit them in his sleigh filling all the spaces.
A dice game where you need to role combinations before running out of attempts.
Arduboy Assistant is a program that allows you to manage an Arduboy’s EEPROM as well as test several hardware and software components.
This game teaches you the way to draw “MagicalCircle”.
A simple drawing program.
A sprite editor with save functionality.
An etch-a-sketch on the Arduboy!

A toolbox of tools for developing ArduboyTones compatible music and Sprites compatible images. The toolbox permits you to save the progress of your creations in EEPROM allowing you to complete your masterpieces over a number of sessions. Once complete, the output can be downloaded using a serial monitor (like that shipped with the Arduino IDE) in a format you can then paste directly into an Arduboy sketch.

Orbs is losely based on the concept of the PC game Osmos. The user owns an orb that is to capture the other orbs in its universe. The user’s orb is distinguished by sparkles blinking inside of the orb. To win, all other Orbs are to be captured.
This game is inspired by “Mega Man Battle Network” and is an action card game.
Holiday mascots from throughout the calendar must fight in order to compete for the affection of the children throughout the world for some weird reason.
Rescue Princess Mariko from within the Akum'a castle fortress.
Enter the dragon! Battle enemies using an array of flying kicks, normal kicks and punches.
Pocket Fighter is an FTG, you can compete with your Arduboy. The CPU will repeat your actions at previous level.
Three games in one - Space Invaders, Pinball and Pacman.
Three games in one - Tiny Bomber, Tiny Arkanoid, Tiny Gilbert.
Three games in one - Tiny Bert, Tiny Bike, Tiny Trick.
Three games in one - Tiny DDug, Tiny Plaque, Tiny Tris.
Three games in one - Tiny Missile, Tiny Morpion, Tiny Pipe
Three games in one - Blocks Arcade, Blocks Puzzle, Bridge Builder.
Mining, crafting and combat on your arduboy. Explore 64 procedurally generated levels, conquer dungeons and upgrade your kit to survive progressively stronger enemies.

Your task is to move from one platform to another through the constructed blade-bridge. If you get to the exact center of the bridge, you earn one coin. Perfect hit 5 times in a row gives +5 coins. At the hard level, these indicators double. Well, also you will find a small bonus in the store!
Peter Pepper  must walk over hamburger ingredients located across a maze of platforms while avoiding characters who pursue him.
A Castlvania demake.
Rescue the hostages from behind enemy lines - but look out for the tanks that patrol the grounds! An Apple II remake!
Chri-Bocchi Cat - A simple action game where move the cat and bounce gift boxes for 2 minutes.

Crabator is an intense action game where you kill crabs to make money to buy weapons to kill crabs to make money, etc. but watch out, the more crabs you kill the more they are. Each small crab killed gives you $1, each boss gives you $5. Once you have at least $5 you can buy a crate which will give you half a heart and upgrade your weapon. If you run out of ammunition, your weapon is downgraded.
Obviously .. something went wrong. That's for sure! You are hired to fix it. No questions asked. Licensed to shoot all that moves!
Demo unfinished game.
Guide the Fuzzgrawth up the three towers to collect the three ‘things’! It’s a fast paced platformer against the clock with randomly ordered levels.
Glove is an action-adventure game created in the style of the classic Gauntlet series. Navigate from room to room, blasting bad guys and collecting treasure along the way
A fast paced platformer.
Go forward in right direction. Seek a hollow as refuge not to be crushed.
There are square panels around you. You must jump on them and go up (foreground side). If you miss the panel and fall toward bottom, the game is over.

Despite not having anything to do with a journey to the moon, the game is a 2D sidescrolling platformer with RPG elements including the ability to use a weapon to attack, a health and experience bar, and an attack stat. The general backstory involves aliens invading your planet, and the player hunting them down because it’s sort of fun.
A game quite like Joust!
A remake of the classic Game and Watch game Donkey Kong. Kong has stolen your lunch again. Avoid the barrels and topple the gorilla to retrieve it!
A remake of the classic Game and Watch game Donkey Kong II. Kong has been locked up but Kong Jnr can save him!

Inspired by yet another Game and Watch - PPOT presents Lion Tamer. Someone has left the lion’s cage doors open! Keep them from escaping by blocking their path with your trusty chair. Play alone or with a second lion tamer!

Something’s gone awry out West! Help Dusty Argile adventure out and defeat the baddies who are causing a commotion and stopping him from getting a good night’s rest. Put them to sleep with your handy lasso and rack up as many points as you can, but watch out for falling barrels, cacti, whirling tumbleweeds, snakes, and coyotes! Most of all, watch out for the mad bull and crazy Texan twister!
Jump around, jump up and get down, jump around, float around, jump float, jump, float. Collect those coins.
Heavily influenced by an Amsoft classic, attack advancing mummies and loot the pyramids.

The planet of Turnax has extensive mineral deposits of high value to the Interplanetary Allied Confederation (IPAC). Recent unanticipated attacks by primative species have proven damaging to mining operations. Your mission is to eliminate the primitive hierarchy in minimal time.
Jump from ledge to ledge but watch out as its easy to fall!
An action puzzle game.
In a near future, in 1996, two international companies fight against each other to reign on the pet dry food market.So, what are you waiting for? Let’s go! Eat them all, Square Nose!
Here is is the jumping square man adventure you’ve all been looking for! Jump over chasms! Jump on top of bad guys! Jump into Question blocks and get points! Points!!
Avoid the falling objects.
Move Bert between the squares by jumping about avoiding the bad guys.
Scrawf must sneak around the zoo to collect the food ans feed the animals before and escaping - all without being caught in the flashlight beam of the zoo wardens!
Hashiwokakero 2 is a Japanese number puzzle. Given a set of islands on a 2D grid, each island having a number between 1 and 8, the goal is to build bridges connecting all islands.
This great little puzzle game was written by Wan Sou.
A version of the classic pipes game where you must lay pipe between each pair of nodes without the pipes crossing each other. This version has puzzles ranging from 5 x 5 to 9 x 9.
Navigate through randomly generated mazes.
ArduBrain is an application that helps you keeping your brain sharp training your reflexes, memory, focus and much more!
A puzzle game. Tere are 10 different pieces. You must place all of them into the frame without overlapping.

Help Circuit Dude build an awesome invention by leading him through 75 unique levels, completing circuits and plugging in microchips. After all chips are inserted into their sockets, the exit will activate and you can advance to the next puzzle! What kind of secret invention is Circuit Dude building? Complete all of the levels to find out!
Diamonds is a mix between a breakout game and a puzzle game. Original game was released on HP48 more than 20 years ago.

Lite/Out is a game where you have to turn off all of the lights, but every time you change a light, the surrounding lights change. The game consists of a 5-by-5 grid where some of the blocks are lit up. You’ll complete the level when all of the blocks are not lit.

Logix is an educational game that teaches the basic logic gates used in digital electronics. Once you have completed some introductory puzzles that feature a single gate each, you can move on to harder puzzles that test your learning!
The classic Minesweeper for the Arduboy.
NumberMind - A Master Mind type game with numbers
Quadrastic a simple addictive game based off a favorite psp homebrew game called Squarez.
A remake of a palm pilot game.
A falling block puzzle game.
A Threes! clone.
A moon patrol remake.
A fast paced racing sim.
A top down racing time trail racing game for the ArduBoy similar to Trackmania

Inspired by the Atari 2600 game Enduro. Strap on your goggles. Sink into your seat. And leave all your fears in the pit. You’re about to enter the race of your life. You’ll be required to pass lots of cars each day. From sunrise to sunset - as fast as you can. Welcome to the National Enduro!
Bone Shakers is a racing game where skeletons ride unicycles around a dungeon race track. In part inspired by Super Mario Kart for the SNES.
A port of the 3D puzzle game originally written for the TI-83 calculator.
Mario Kart for the Arduboy.
Compete in races on your BMX.
ArduRogue: a traditional roguelike for the Arduboy.

Arduventure is a classic top-down 8-Bit RPG with original monochrome graphics and musical score. Collect items, weapons, armor, amulets and magic to fight enemies in turn-based battle system. Explore a massive world map larger than the one in Zelda: Links Awakening!
Ardynia - a Zelda style adventure.

Catacombs of the Damned! is a first person shooter / dungeon crawler where you navigate 10 floors of a randomly generated dungeon dispatching monsters with your magic fireballs whilst collecting as much loot as possible.

A hilariously complicated combination of poker and blackjack, using an 8-suited deck.You can customize your character, accumulate money through betting, etc. As you gain money, your ‘rank’ increases, with the ultimate goal of being rich enough to become the Patrician of Ankh-Morpork!

The evil Astarok has cast a nasty curse on the folk of Griford and turned them into pumpkins! The town’s people have asked you to battle the AstaroK and his evil friends in their hideout - an old castle on the edge of town. Can you release the town from the curse of AztaroK?

Each year the people of the village choose a new champion to protect them from Astarok. Compete in the trials to see how far you can get and you could be that champion! Your choice of runes will select different courses … some are easier than others!
A dungeon crawler for the Arduboy.

Mini Rogue is a 9-card game in which a single player delves into a deep dungeon to get the famous ruby called The Og’s Blood on the bottom floor. The player must choose how to spend their resources in order to be powerful enough to confront ever difficult monsters. Random events and encounters make every play-through a unique experience.
Shattered Lands - a multi-part RPG saga for Arduboy.
Similar to the classic Legend of the River King, Tackle Box is a fishing-themed role playing video game.
A platformer game with elements of RPG and puzzle-solving challenges.
A virus turned your neighbours into Zombies but not all are infected. Find them .. quick!
A horizontal space shoot 'em up.
A remake of the classic CapCom game 1944 The Battle of Midway.
A remake of the classic Tanks game from the Amiga by Gary Roberts.
CosmicPods is a tiny shoot-'em-up game. You are a cosmic squid, shoot octopuses up!
You are a cowboy and have to shoot randomly generated targets and grab time bonuses that drop from the top of the stage to continue.
Side scrolling space shooter.
A space flight / fight simulator.
1NVADER is a one or two-player game played with one button, one laser, one 1NVADER, and one life. Play co-operatively, or competitively with a friend, or face the 1NVADER alone.
Kill each wave of attacking aliens before you fuel or health runs out. Rescue the captured astronaut to get extra points!
A cute infinite shooter for Arduboy.
You start with a small tank and your goal is to get as deep as possilbe into enemy territory. Some enemys drop coins for upgrading the weapon of your choice.
It’s extremely similar to Missile Command.

Based on the Atari arcade game Canyon Bomber. You can speed up or slow down your plane and drop bombs in the canyon to knock out boulders for points. Missing rocks will result in losing points, while hitting multiple boulders at once gives extra points. The game is over when the canyon is emptied. I'm not sure what the theoretical high score is, but my best games have been around 240 with several misses.

The king needs your help to keep the Dark Lord’s army from destroying the kingdom. The Wizards will arrive after the 5th day and the rest of our army will be back in 20 days. The king is counting on you to hold the wall. Hold strong, noble archer, HOLD STRONG!
There's trouble under the sea, but Nina will fight her way to the heart of it. An aquatic shoot-em-up adventure!
A space shoot 'em up.
A Gradius type of side-scroller shmup.
Protect your host's teeth from plaque in this littl shmup.

Inspired by the Star Wars Battle Pod Arcade Game. It depicts the rebels assault on the Doom Sphere, the Empire enormous space station and you, as a Rebel pilot, have to destroy the Imperial Fighters until you get a chance to shoot into the Exhaustion Port and destroy it.
A space shoot 'em up!
18-hole Mini Golf game with stunning vector graphics!
Skateboarding on the Arduboy.
Icehockey for the Arduboy.
The Golf Companion for the Arduboy. Keep scores for up to 4 players.
